title: Bag-Shaped Vase
description:
Quartz vase, pear shaped, with rounded base and flaring lip. Translucent, slightly milky color. 
Condition: Intact.

museum_location.name: Old Kingdom to 18th Dynasty, Egyptian Galleries, 3rd Floor

completeness.name: Best
completeness.description: All data has been vetted. Objects generally have quality photos and descriptions.

labels.title: 37.108E
labels.content: Craftsmen began using rock crystal to make small objects, such as beads and cosmetic vessels, as early as the Predynastic Period. An extremely hard material, rock crystal resists scratches and abrasions.

collections.name: Egyptian, Classical, Ancient Near Eastern Art
